verses.text: \w Blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and sound an \w alarm|strong="H7321"\w* in my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: let all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*: for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, for \add it is\add* nigh at \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*;\f + \fr 2.1 \ft trumpet: or, cornet\f*

A \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* and of \w gloominess|strong="H0653"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w* and of thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*, as the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and a \w strong|strong="H6099"\w*; there hath not \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* the like, neither shall be any \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* it, \add even\add* to the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft of many…: Heb. of generation and generation\f*

A \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devoureth|strong="H0398"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; and \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them a \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* \w burneth|strong="H3857"\w*: the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* as the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them a \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; yea, and nothing shall \w escape|strong="H6413"\w* them.

The \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of them \add is\add* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and as \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, so shall they \w run|strong="H7323"\w*.

Like the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* on the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall they \w leap|strong="H7540"\w*, like the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* that \w devoureth|strong="H0398"\w* the \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*, as a \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* set in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w array|strong="H6186"\w*.

Before their \w face|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be much \w pained|strong="H2342"\w*: all \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* shall \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w blackness|strong="H6289"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft blackness: Heb. pot\f*

They shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w* like mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*; they shall \w climb|strong="H5927"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* like \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*; and they shall \w march|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* on his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and they shall not \w break|strong="H5670"\w* their \w ranks|strong="H0734"\w*:

Neither shall \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w thrust|strong="H1766"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*; they shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H1397"\w* in his \w path|strong="H4546"\w*: and \add when\add* they \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w sword|strong="H7973"\w*, they shall not be \w wounded|strong="H1214"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft sword: or, dart\f*

They shall run to and \w fro|strong="H8264"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; they shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, they shall climb \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*; they shall enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* at the \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* like a \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w quake|strong="H7264"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall \w tremble|strong="H7493"\w*: the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* shall be \w dark|strong="H6937"\w*, and the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* shall \w withdraw|strong="H0622"\w* their \w shining|strong="H5051"\w*:

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w utter|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w army|strong="H2428"\w*: for his \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \add is\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*: for \add he is\add* \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* that \w executeth|strong="H6213"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*; and who can \w abide|strong="H3557"\w* it?

¶ Therefore also now, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye \add even\add* to me with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*, and with \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, and with \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w*:

And \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and not your \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for he \add is\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* and \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w*, \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \w repenteth|strong="H5162"\w* him of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \add if\add* he will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*, and \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him; \add even\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

¶ \w Blow|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*:

\w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, \w assemble|strong="H6908"\w* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w children|strong="H5768"\w*, and those that \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* the \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*: let the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*, and the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w* out of her \w closet|strong="H2646"\w*.

Let the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* between the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and let them \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Spare|strong="H2347"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* not thine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* to \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, that the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* should rule \w over|strong="H4910"\w* them: wherefore should they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Where \add is\add* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?  +  r 2.17  t rule over: or, use a byword against *
¶ Then will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Yea, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* you \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and ye shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* therewith: and I will no more \w make|strong="H5414"\w* you a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*:

But I will remove far \w off|strong="H7368"\w* from you the \w northern|strong="H6830"\w* \add army\add*, and will \w drive|strong="H5080"\w* him into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w barren|strong="H6723"\w* and \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, with his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6931"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and his hinder \w part|strong="H5490"\w* toward the \w utmost|strong="H0314"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and his \w stink|strong="H0889"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and his ill \w savour|strong="H6709"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, because he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1431"\w*.\f + \fr 2.20 \ft hath…: Heb. hath magnified to do\f*

¶ \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, O \w land|strong="H0127"\w*; be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1431"\w*.\f + \fr 2.21 \ft will…: Heb. hath magnified to do\f*

Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, ye \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: for the \w pastures|strong="H4999"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* do \w spring|strong="H1876"\w*, for the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* her \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* and the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* do \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* their \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*.

Be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* then, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you the former \w rain|strong="H4175"\w* \w moderately|strong="H6666"\w*, and he will cause to come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* for you the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, the former \w rain|strong="H4175"\w*, and the latter \w rain|strong="H4456"\w* in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*.\f + \fr 2.23 \ft the former rain moderately: or, a teacher of righteousness\f*\f + \fr 2.23 \ft moderately: Heb. according to righteousness\f*

And the \w floors|strong="H1637"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*, and the \w fats|strong="H3342"\w* shall \w overflow|strong="H7783"\w* with \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* and \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*.

And I will \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* to you the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* that the \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* hath \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, the \w cankerworm|strong="H3218"\w*, and the \w caterpiller|strong="H2625"\w*, and the \w palmerworm|strong="H1501"\w*, my \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* which I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* among you.

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* in \w plenty|strong="H0398"\w*, and be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that hath \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w wondrously|strong="H6381"\w* with you: and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \add that\add* I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and none else: and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w*, \add that\add* I will pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* upon all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; and your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, your old \w men|strong="H2205"\w* shall \w dream|strong="H2492"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, your young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w visions|strong="H2384"\w*:
And also upon the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and upon the \w handmaids|strong="H8198"\w* in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* will I pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

And I will \w shew|strong="H5414"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w pillars|strong="H8490"\w* of \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*.

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* into \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and the \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* whosoever shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*: for in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall be \w deliverance|strong="H6413"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, and in the \w remnant|strong="H8300"\w* whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w*.
